This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Friendly Update]] ({{BE}} 0.15.x releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Overworld Update]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 0.14.x releases)

==Items==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}}
|-
|[[Raw mutton]]
|[[File:Raw Mutton JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
|Adult [[sheep]] will drop 1-2 raw mutton when killed.
|
* Press and hold the {{Control|Use}} key in the hotkey bar to eat raw mutton. Each raw mutton will restore {{hunger|2}} [[hunger value]] and 1.2 [[saturation]].
* Raw mutton can be used to [[breed]] or heal tamed [[wolves]], guide them to move around, and also speed up the remaining growth time of tamed pups by 10%.
* Raw mutton can be used to cook cooked mutton.
|-
|[[Cooked mutton]]
|[[File:Cooked Mutton JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
|Adult sheep will drop 1-2 cooked mutton when they die while on fire.
{{Smelting
|showname=1
|Raw Mutton
|Cooked Mutton
|0.35
}}
|
* Press and hold the {{Control|Use}} key in the hotkey bar to eat cooked mutton. Each cooked mutton will restore {{hunger|6}} [[hunger value]] and 9.6 [[saturation]].
* Cooked mutton can be used to breed or heal tamed [[wolves]], guide them to move around, and can also speed up the remaining growth time of tamed pups by 10%.
|-
|New mobs [[spawn egg]]s
|{{Animate|Horse Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png; Mule Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png; Donkey Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png; Zombie Horse Spawn Egg BE1.png; Skeleton Horse Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png; Stray Spawn Egg BE1.png; Husk Spawn Egg BE1.png; Wither Skeleton Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png|84px}}

|Used to generate the corresponding [[mob]].

* Name tags can be found in [[monster room]] and [[mineshaft]] [[chest]]s.
|Used to customize names for creatures.
